name: Dagora
description: Dagora - NFT Playground for Next-Gen Fandoms Dagora is an NFT platform that bridges the gap between artists and their passionate fan communities. It offers a unique playground for creators to tokenize their digital art, music, and collectibles, allowing fans to own exclusive pieces of their favorite artists' work while supporting them directly. Our goal is to build a creative hub where artists and fans grow together, sharing value in this new era.
